403:1: atha avalokiteśvaro bhagavantametadavocat–adṛṣṭamaṇḍalasya na dātavyāṃ kathaṃ bhagavatpadmāṅkamudrāmanugṛhṇāti ?
403:5: maṇḍalasyedaṃ nimittaṃ caturasraṃ pañcahastapramāṇaṃ sāmantakena madhye maṇḍalasyāmitābhaṃ likhet|
403:6: indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ marakatacūrṇaṃ sphāṭikacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇānyamitābhasya tathāgatasya kāye saṃyojayitavyāni|
403:8: vāmapārśve ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā kartavyā caturbhujā śaratkāṇḍagauravarṇā,
403:12: dau hastau saṃprayuktau sarvarājendrā nāma mudrā kartavyā|
403:16: tasya ca maṇḍalasya caturdvāreṣu catvāro mahārājāḥ kartavyāḥ,
403:19: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā icchati maṇḍalaṃ praveṣṭum,
403:30: athāmitābhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho'valokiteśvarametadavocat–yadi kulaputra indranīlacūrṇaṃ padmarāgacūrṇaṃ suvarṇarūpyacūrṇaṃ daridrasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā na saṃvidyante tāni cūrṇāni,
403:33: yadi kulaputra tadapi na saṃvidyate deśāntaragatasya sthānapadacyutasya,
